# PlaPrice Development Guidelines

Auto-generated from all feature plans. Last updated: 2025-12-30

## Active Technologies
- Python 3.10+ + PySide6 (Qt 공식 Python 바인딩), requests, beautifulsoup4, lxml, pydantic, rich (002-gui-interface)
- JSON 파일 (~/.plaprice/shops.json, ~/.plaprice/gui_settings.json) (002-gui-interface)

- Python 3.10+ + requests, beautifulsoup4, rich, pydantic (001-shop-price-crawler)

## Project Structure

```text
src/
tests/
```

## Commands

cd src; pytest; ruff check .

## Code Style

Python 3.10+: Follow standard conventions

## Recent Changes
- 002-gui-interface: Added Python 3.10+ + PySide6 (Qt 공식 Python 바인딩), requests, beautifulsoup4, lxml, pydantic, rich

- 001-shop-price-crawler: Added Python 3.10+ + requests, beautifulsoup4, rich, pydantic
